    • Method Detail

      • IndividualRequest

        public boolean IndividualRequest(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String classPref,
                        char seatPref)
        Returns whether or not the request was fulfilled. Allows user to attempt to reserve an individual seat on the plane.
        Parameters:
        name - passenger's name
        classPref - class preference request
        seatPref - seat preference request aisle/center/window

      • GroupRequest

        public boolean GroupRequest(int num,
                   java.lang.String classPref,
                   java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> names)
        Returns whether or not the group request was fulfilled. Allows user to reserve seats for a group on the plane.
        Parameters:
        num - number of people to try to add
        classPref - class preference request
        names - queue of individuals to add the plane

      • CancelRequest

        public boolean CancelRequest(java.lang.String name)
        Returns whether or not the cancel request was fulfilled Allows user to cancel a reservation for a passenger on the plane.
        Parameters:
        name - name of passenger

      • CancelRequest

        public boolean CancelRequest(java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> names)
        Returns whether or not the group cancel request was fulfilled Allows user to cancel a list or group of passengers on the plane.
        Parameters:
        names - list of passengers to cancel
